content:
Medical Nutrition Therapy is an effective strategy to improve the management and prevention of chronic diseases like diabetes among America’s seniors. I introduced a bipartisan bill with Senator Gary Peters to expand Medicare beneficiaries’ access to this therapy that can improve health outcomes and reduce unnecessary health care costs.

COLLINS.SENATE.GOV
Senators Collins, Peters Introduce Bipartisan Bill to Improve Disease Management and Prevention for Seniors | Senator Susan Collins
name: Susan M. Collins
text: medical nutrition therapy effective strategy improve management prevention chronic diseases like diabetes among americas seniors introduced bipartisan bill senator gary peters expand medicare beneficiaries access therapy improve health outcomes reduce unnecessary health care costscollinssenategovsenators collins peters introduce bipartisan bill improve disease management prevention seniors senator susan collins

content:
Medical Nutrition Therapy has proven to help manage & prevent diseases like diabetes among seniors. @SenGaryPeters & I introduced a bipartisan bill to expand Medicare beneficiaries’ access to this therapy to improve health outcomes & reduce costs.

collins.senate.gov/newsroom/senat…
name: Susan M. Collins
text: medical nutrition therapy proven help manage prevent diseases like diabetes among seniors introduced bipartisan bill expand medicare beneficiaries access therapy improve health outcomes reduce costscollinssenategovnewsroomsenat

content:
Heading to my office for my U.S Service Academy Info Session at 1:30 PM. I’m honored to nominate Hudson Valley students to attend the academies each year, including the U.S. Military Academy at West Point, right here in our backyard. Students who attend a service academy receive a top-notch education that will prepare them for a lifetime of service. This info session will answer any questions you have about the highly competitive application process. Hope to see you in a bit.
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/us-service-academy-info-session-tickets-155864090691

EVENTBRITE.COM
U.S. Service Academy Info Session
name: Sean Patrick Maloney
text: heading office us service academy info session pm im honored nominate hudson valley students attend academies year including us military academy west point right backyard students attend service academy receive topnotch education prepare lifetime service info session answer questions highly competitive application process hope see biteventbritecomus service academy info session

content:
“Climate change, ocean acidification, plastic pollution, overfishing, and other human activities are stressing our oceans. We need bold, ambitious, science-based solutions to these growing challenges... Simply put, we need a moonshot equivalent for the ocean; we need an “oceanshot”"

Read Chairwoman Congresswoman Mikie Sherrill's Full Statement from today's House Science Subcommittee on Environment hearing titled, “Defining a National ‘Oceanshot’: Accelerating Ocean and Great Lakes Science and Technology.”

https://science.house.gov/news/press-releases/chairwoman-sherrill-opening-statement-for-hearing-on-a-national-oceanshot-to-accelerate-ocean-and-great-lakes-science-and-technology
name: House Science, Space, & Technology Committee
text: climate change ocean acidification plastic pollution overfishing human activities stressing oceans need bold ambitious sciencebased solutions growing challenges simply put need moonshot equivalent ocean need oceanshotread chairwoman congresswoman mikie sherrills full statement todays house science subcommittee environment hearing titled defining national oceanshot accelerating ocean great lakes science technology
